post.description: Registers or updates a delivery config manifest.

requestBody.description: The delivery config. If its `name` matches an existing delivery config the operation is an update, otherwise a new delivery config is created.

serviceAccount.description: The service account Spinnaker will authenticate with when making changes.

SubmittedDeliveryConfig.description: A manifest specifying the environments and resources that comprise an application.

allOf.description: Optional locations that are propagated to any [resources] where they are not specified.
